statements: SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data;
SELECT channel, visitors FROM website_traffic_data WHERE date='2022-01-01' AND conversions > 5;
SELECT SUM(visitors) AS total_visitors, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM website_traffic_data;
SELECT channel, revenue FROM website_traffic_data ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT date, channel, visitors, revenue FROM website_traffic_data WHERE channel='Organic' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT date, channel, visitors, conversions, revenue FROM website_traffic_data WHERE conversions > 5 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY date ASC, revenue DESC;
SELECT channel, SUM(visitors) AS total_visitors, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM website_traffic_data GROUP BY channel HAVING SUM(conversions) > 10;
SELECT date, AVG(visitors) AS avg_visitors_per_day, AVG(revenue) AS avg_revenue_per_day FROM website_traffic_data GROUP BY date;
SELECT channel, MAX(visitors) AS max_visitors, MIN(visitors) AS min_visitors FROM website_traffic_data GROUP BY channel ORDER BY max_visitors DESC;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data WHERE pageviews > 1000
SELECT id, channel, pageviews FROM website_traffic_data WHERE date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT channel, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM website_traffic_data GROUP BY channel
SELECT id, channel, pageviews FROM website_traffic_data ORDER BY pageviews DESC
SELECT * FROM advertising_strategies WHERE budget > 5000
SELECT id, date, channel, pageviews FROM website_traffic_data WHERE pageviews > 100 ORDER BY pageviews DESC
SELECT channel, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM website_traffic_data GROUP BY channel ORDER BY total_conversions DESC
SELECT channel, AVG(pageviews) AS avg_pageviews FROM website_traffic_data WHERE date > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY channel
SELECT channel, target_audience, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_strategies WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date
SELECT channel, target_audience FROM advertising_strategies WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY target_audience
SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data;
SELECT date, channel, visitors FROM website_traffic_data WHERE conversions > 0;
SELECT channel, COUNT(*) AS total_visitors FROM website_traffic_data GROUP BY channel;
SELECT channel, visitors, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM website_traffic_data ORDER BY formatted_date DESC;
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM marketing_channels WHERE channel_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data WHERE date = '2022-02-01';
SELECT channel, visitors, conversions FROM website_traffic_data WHERE channel = 'Organic' ORDER BY visitors DESC;
SELECT channel, SUM(visitors) AS total_visitors FROM website_traffic_data GROUP BY channel HAVING total_visitors > 5000;

SELECT wd.date, wd.channel, wd.visitors, ms.strategy_name FROM website_traffic_data wd JOIN marketing_channels mc ON wd.channel = mc.channel_name JOIN advertising_strategies ms ON mc.channel_type = 'Paid Search' AND ms.target_audience = 'Ages 25-34';
SELECT wd.date, wd.channel, wd.visitors, ms.strategy_name, ms.bidding_strategy FROM website_traffic_data wd LEFT JOIN advertising_strategies ms ON wd.channel = ms.target_audience;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data;
SELECT channel, visits FROM website_traffic_data WHERE conversions > 5;
SELECT channel, visits FROM website_traffic_data ORDER BY visits DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience FROM advertising_strategies WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT date, ad_id, clicks, cost FROM ad_performance ORDER BY date ASC, cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data;
SELECT channel, conversions, visits FROM website_traffic_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, budget FROM advertising_strategies WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT channel_name, channel_id, platform FROM marketing_channels ORDER BY platform DESC;
SELECT date, ad_id, clicks, impressions, cost FROM ad_performance WHERE cost > 100 ORDER BY ad_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data;
SELECT channel_name, visits FROM website_traffic_data ORDER BY visits DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, budget FROM advertising_strategies WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT date, channel_name, visits, conversions FROM website_traffic_data WHERE visits > 100 AND conversions > 10;
SELECT channel_name, date FROM channel_performance JOIN marketing_channels ON channel_performance.channel_id = marketing_channels.channel_id;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data ORDER BY date DESC, visits ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT channel_name, SUM(visits) AS total_visits FROM website_traffic_data GROUP BY channel_name HAVING total_visits > 1000 ORDER BY total_visits DESC;
SELECT date, channel_name, conversions FROM website_traffic_data WHERE conversions > 0 ORDER BY date, conversions DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT c.channel_name, COUNT(*) AS total_strategies FROM advertising_strategies AS s JOIN marketing_channels AS c ON s.channel_id = c.channel_id GROUP BY c.channel_name ORDER BY total_strategies DESC;
SELECT o.date, s.strategy_name, o.improvements FROM optimization_results AS o JOIN advertising_strategies AS s ON o.strategy_id = s.strategy_id ORDER BY o.date DESC, s.strategy_name ASC LIMIT 7;
